matched.title: Aiello Center at Baltimore Washington Medical Center
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Aiello Center at Baltimore Washington Medical Center
matched.body:
Advanced Radiology has 30 imaging centers that provide services in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties. Our imaging center is located at the Aiello Center at Baltimore Washington Medical Center, which is just 2.2 miles away from Marley Station Mall and 2.3 miles from Southdale Shopping Center. Our imaging center is also accessible from 695 and 97. We offer the following imaging services: CT, CTA, Calcium Scoring, DEXA/Bone Density, Fluoroscopy, MRA, MRI (1.5T), MRI (3T Wide Open), Mammography (3D), Nuclear Medicine, Ultrasound, and X-Ray. We are able to accommodate most schedules and urgent cases. Our quick turnaround time for patients’ reports enable you to receive your results in a timely manner. 

If you or your family is in need of an X-ray for an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins. No appointment is required for X-ray services. Advanced Radiology-Aiello Center serves the Glen Burnie, Pasadena, Severn, and Brooklyn Park areas and is only 1 mile from Oakwood Elementary School, 1.1 miles from Saint Pauls Lutheran School, and 3.8 miles from Patient First in Glen Burnie.

matched.title: Annapolis
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Annapolis
matched.body:
Advanced Radiology has 30 imaging centers that provide services in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford and Howard counties. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties. We offer the following imaging services: CT, CTA, Calcium Scoring, DEXA/Bone Density, Fluoroscopy, MRA, MRI (3T Wide-Open), Mammography (3D), Ultrasound, and X-ray. 

Our imaging center is located on Defense Highway, which is less than a mile from Annapolis Towne Center and Westfield Annapolis. We are also in close proximity to Gateway Village, Best Buy and Home Depot. You can access our imaging center from route 50. This location serves the Annapolis, Kent Islands, Arnold, and Davidsonville areas.

We accommodate the busy schedules of our patients by offering morning, afternoon and weekend hours. X-ray exams are performed on a walk-in basis. Our report turn-around time is second to none to ensure that our patients receive their results in a timely manner.

matched.title: Arundel Mills at BWMC Health Services
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Arundel Mills at BWMC Health Services
matched.body:
For over 20 years, Advanced Radiology has provided imaging services to patients in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties. What started as five separate radiology practices in metropolitan area, has grown to 30 imaging centers. We offer a full range of imaging services that includes open and high-field MRI/MRA, CT/CTA, PET/CT, digital and 3D Mammography, bone density, nuclear medicine, 3D/4D ultrasound, fluoroscopy, and digital X-ray. 

Arundel Mills at BWMC Health Services is conveniently located at the Baltimore Washington Medical Center in Anne Arundel County. Our imaging center is just 0.5 miles from Arundel Mills mall, 0.4 miles from Arundel Village and 0.5 miles from Hebron-Harman Elementary School. We service the surrounding communities of Villages of Dorchester, Wright Road Community, Dorchester Woods, Harmans, Gambrills, Odenton, and Merriweather. You can access our center easily from Baltimore-Washington Parkway, and Route 100.   

Advanced Radiology is committed to providing care that meets the needs of our patients. We are able to provide appointments that fit virtually any schedule and accommodate urgent cases. Walk-in appointments are welcomed for X-ray needs.

matched.title: Crossroads
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Crossroads
matched.body:
For over 20 years, Advanced Radiology has been providing imaging services to patients in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties.  The Crossroads imaging center provides the following services: CT, Calcium Scoring, DEXA/Bone Density, Fluoroscopy, MRA, MRI (1.5T), MRI (3T Wide-Open), Mammography (3D), Nuclear Medicine, PET/CT, Ultrasound, and X-Ray. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties.

Our Crossroads imaging center is 2.9 miles from Long Gate Shopping Center, 1 mile from Fairway Hills Golf Club, 2.9 miles from The Mall in Columbia, 4.4 miles from Howard Community College, and 1.5 miles from Centennial Park. You can access our center off of Route 108 and Dorsey Hall Road from 29 and/or 100. We service the following surrounding communities: Ellicott City, Columbia, Wilde Lake, Long Reach, and Hickory Ridge.   

We pride ourselves on accommodating the busy schedules of our patients by offering morning, afternoon and weekend hours. If you or your family encounters an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins. We now offer a variety of appointment scheduling options for your convenience. To schedule an appointment you can go online, send a request or give us a call.

matched.title: Fisher Medical Building
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Fisher Medical Building
matched.body:
For over 20 years, Advanced Radiology has been providing imaging services to patients in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties. The Fisher Medical Building imaging center provides the following services: CT, Calcium Scoring, DEXA/Bone Density, Fluoroscopy, MRA, MRI (1.5 T Wide-Open), MRI (1.5T), Mammography, Mammography (3D), Nuclear Medicine, PET/CT, Ultrasound and X-Ray. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties.

Advanced Radiology | Fisher Medical Building has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at the Advanced Radiology in the Fisher Medical Building are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

The Fisher Medical Building center is 0.5 miles from Carroll County Farm Museum; 1.7 miles from Townmall of Westminster, 2 miles from McDaniel College, 2.5 miles from Carroll Community College, up the hill from the Westminster Senior Center, and next to the Cancer Center. You can access our center at the intersection of Stoner Avenue and Route 32 from 97 (Washington Road). We service the following surrounding communities: Alto Vista, Westminster, Yorkland, Taneytown, New Windsor, Union Bridge, and Avondale.

We pride ourselves on accommodating the busy schedules of our patients by offering morning, afternoon and weekend hours. If you or your family encounters an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins. We now offer a variety of appointment scheduling options for your convenience. To schedule an appointment you can go online, send a request or give us a call.

matched.title: GBMC Imaging
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | GBMC Imaging
matched.body:
GBMC Imaging is conveniently located 1 mile away from Towson University, 1.3 miles from Loyola Blakefield, and 2.8 miles from Towson Town Center. We service the surrounding communities of Towson, Hampton, Parkville, Lutherville-Timonium, and Roland Park. Our center is conveniently located 1 mile from Greater Baltimore Medical Center and is accessible from 695. GBMC Imaging is now conveniently located near Iris Park. View GBMC campus map.

GBMC Imaging offers a variety of exams including 3T Wide-Open MRI, 1.5T Wide-Open MRI, PET/CT, CT, Ultrasound, Low-Dose CT Lung Screening, Prostate MRI, Calcium Scoring, and walk-in X-Ray. We pride ourselves on accommodating our patient's busy schedules by offering morning, afternoon, and weekend hours. If you or your family encounters an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins. We offer a variety of appointment scheduling options for your convenience. Click here to request or schedule an appointment, or call us today at 410-580-2330.

Advanced Radiology has 30 imaging centers that provide services in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties. We offer the following imaging services: CT, MRA, MRI (1.5T), MRI (3T), and PET/CT.

matched.title: GBMC Women's Imaging Center
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | GBMC Women's Imaging Center
matched.body:
Advanced Radiology | GBMC Women's Imaging Center is conveniently located 1.6 miles from Towson University, 1.9 miles from Towson Town Center, and 4.5 miles from Lake Roland. Our center is conveniently located at Greater Baltimore Medical Center and it’s accessible from 695. We service the surrounding communities of Armagh, Ruxton, Lutherville, Yorktown, and Cedarcroft. Find our entrance near Sheppard Pratt at the intersection of Charles Street and Malvern.

Our GBMC Women's Imaging Center has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program. The breast imaging services at our GBMC Women's Imaging Center are fully accredited in Mammography, Stereotactic Breast Biopsy, Breast Ultrasound, and Ultrasound-Guided Breast Biopsy. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs.

Advanced Radiology has 30 imaging centers that provide services in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties. We offer the following imaging services: DEXA/Bone Density, 3D Mammography, and Ultrasound. We pride ourselves on accommodating our patient's busy schedules by offering morning, afternoon, and weekend hours. If you or your family encounters an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins. We now offer a variety of appointment scheduling options for your convenience. Click here to request or schedule an appointment, or call us today at 410-580-2330.

matched.title: Medical Arts Building
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Medical Arts Building
matched.body:
For over 20 years, Advanced Radiology has been providing imaging services to patients in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties.  The Medical Arts Building center provides: DEXA/Bone Density, Fluoroscopy, Mammography (3D), Nuclear Medicine, PET/CT, Ultrasound, and X-Ray. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various specialties. 

Advanced Radiology | Medical Arts Building has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Medical Arts location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

Our Medical Arts Building imaging center is located across from Franklin Square hospital, next to Weinberg Cancer Center and in close proximity to Costco Wholesale, Gardens of Faith Memorial Gardens, Nottingham Square, Costco Plaza, and Eagles Walk Apartment Homes. You can access our center from 695 and 95. We service the following surrounding communities: Rossville, Whitemarsh Estates, Overlea, and Apple Ridge. 
 
We pride ourselves on accommodating the busy schedules of our patients by offering morning, afternoon and weekend hours.  If you or your family encounters an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins.  We now offer a variety of appointment scheduling options for your convenience. To schedule an appointment you can go online, send a request or give us a call.

matched.title: Shipley’s Choice
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Shipley’s Choice
matched.body:
For over 20 years, Advanced Radiology has been providing imaging services to patients in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford and Howard Counties. Our imaging center offers a full range of imaging services that includes CT, CTA, DEXA/Bone Density, MRA, MRI (1.2T Open/High Field), Mammography, Ultrasound, and X-Ray. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties. 

Located right off of route 100, our imaging center is just 2.1 miles from Marley Station Mall, 2.1 miles from Archbishop Spalding High School, 2.2 miles from Southdale Shopping Center, and 1.1 miles from North Arundel Aquatic Center. We service the surrounding communities of South Gate, Arbordale, Gambrills, Odenton, Waugh Chapel, and Marley. You can access our imaging center from route 100 and 97. 

We accommodate the busy schedules of our patients by offering morning, afternoon and weekend hours. X-ray exams are performed on a walk-in basis. Our report turn-around time is second to none to ensure that our patients receive their results in a timely manner.

matched.title: The Breast Center at University of MD St. Joseph Medical Center Bldg A
matched.name: Advanced Radiology | The Breast Center at University of MD St. Joseph Medical Center Bldg A
matched.body:
Advanced Radiology has 30 imaging centers that provide services in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties. All of our physicians are board-certified and skilled in various radiologic specialties. The Breast Center at St. Joseph’s provides the following services: DEXA/Bone Density, Mammography (3D), and Ultrasound. 

Advanced Radiology | Breast Center at St Joseph Medical Center has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at Advanced Radiology Imaging Center on the Saint Joseph Medical Center campus are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

Our breast imaging center is located off of Osler Drive in close proximity to Towson University, Towson Town Center, Loyola Blakefield, Calvert Hall College High School, Loch Raven Technical Academy and the Country Club of Maryland. You can access our center from 695, 83 or York Road. We service the surrounding communities of Armagh, Eudowood, Lutherville, Timonium, Towson, and Yorktown. 

We pride ourselves on accommodating the busy schedules of our patients by offering morning, afternoon and weekend hours. If you or your family encounters an unexpected injury or illness, we accept walk-ins.  We now offer a variety of appointment scheduling options for your convenience. To schedule an appointment you can go online, send a request or give us a call.

matched.name: Advanced Radiology | Timonium Crossing
matched.body:
Advanced Radiology | Timonium Crossing is located in the Timonium Crossing Shopping Center at the intersection of York Road and East Timonium Road - near the Timonium Fairgrounds. This center offers PET/CT, MRI (3T Wide-Open), 3D Mammography, CT, Ultrasound, Nuclear Medicine and X-ray, among other modalities.

Advanced Radiology | Timonium Crossing has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Timonium Crossing location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

For over 20 years, Advanced Radiology has been providing imaging services to patients in Anne Arundel, Baltimore, Carroll, Harford, and Howard counties.

matched.title: Calvert Medical Imaging Center
matched.name: American Radiology Services | Calvert Medical Imaging Center
matched.body:
At the Calvert Medical Imaging Center, we offer a broad range of services including MRI (3T Wide Open), MRA, CT, 3D mammography, 3D & 4D ultrasound, DEXA bone density scan, and PET/CT imaging, Musculoskeletal Ultrasound and walk-in X-Ray. Located next to Calvert Memorial Hospital, our center has convenient parking and easy access from the blue, green, white and pink bus lines. We are less than half a mile away from the Fox Run Shopping center and Calvert Library in Prince Frederick.

American Radiology | Calvert Medical Imaging Center has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at American Radiology | CMIC are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

A specialized exam called Musculoskeletal Ultrasound (MSK US) is offered at this location and ARS | Howard County. Musculoskeletal Ultrasound (MSK US) is a safe, painless, and radiation-free exam that provides real-time images of muscles, tendons, ligaments, nerves, and cartilage throughout the body.

At American Radiology Services | Calvert Medical Imaging Center, our combination of dedicated specialty physicians, friendly compassionate staff and cutting edge technology allow us to offer our patients only the very best in diagnosis, management, follow up and care. Contact us to find out more about our services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Howard County
matched.name: American Radiology Services | Howard County
matched.body:
Location Highlights:

  • Evening and weekend hours

  • Easy parking

  • Conveniently located off major routes

  • Comprehensive women's imaging services

Our American Radiology Services | Howard County outpatient imaging center is equipped with the capable staff and technology to give you fast and accurate result. We offer Wide Open and Traditional MRI options, 3D Mammography, 3D/4D Ultrasound, CT, CTA, DEXA Bone Density Scan, X-Ray, Calcium Scoring, Musculoskeletal Ultrasound, and several other procedures.

A specialized exam called Musculoskeletal Ultrasound (MSK US) is offered at this location and Calvert Medical Imaging Center. Musculoskeletal Ultrasound (MSK US) is a safe, painless, and radiation-free exam that provides real-time images of muscles, tendons, ligaments, nerves, and cartilage throughout the body.

You can find us located just off of the outer loop of the beltway near Meadowbrook Park, Howard High School and Orchard Crossing Townhomes. Make an appointment with our kind and helpful staff today. We will make sure to find a time that fits into your busy schedule.

matched.body:
At American Radiology Services of Patuxent, we strive to provide you with accurate and timely exam results using leading-edge imaging technology. This imaging center offers a 1.5T & 1.2T High-Field Open MRI, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, CT, DEXA (for bone density), X-ray, Fluoroscopy, Biopsy, and Nuclear Medicine.

Located in the Calvert Village Marketplace complex on Route 4, near the TJ Maxx. ARS of Patuxent offers additional convenience by having 2 imaging centers in Prince Frederick.
American Radiology Services offers a level of patient care unparalleled to other imaging centers. We work hard to exceed your expectations from the ease of scheduling to providing your physician with timely and precise reports. Contact us to find out more about our services, major insurances accepted, and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Clinton Crossings
matched.name: Borg & Ide Imaging | Clinton Crossings
matched.address:
995 Senator Keating Blvd.
Bldg. E, Ste. 100
matched.body:
For over 90 years, Borg and Ide Imaging has proudly offered diagnostic imaging across the Rochester region.

Borg and Ide Imaging | Clinton Crossings is located on Senator Keating Boulevard in Brighton, NY. At this full-service imaging center, we offer 3T MRI, 1.2T Open/High Field MRI, CT, PET/CT, Nuclear Medicine, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, Interventional Radiology, and more.

Breast imaging services at our Clinton Crossings location are fully accredited in Mammography, Stereotactic Breast Biopsy, Breast Ultrasound, Breast MRI, and Breast Biopsy. 

Borg and Ide Imaging | Clinton Crossings has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the ACR’s voluntary breast imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

Our Clinton Crossings location also offers Interventional Radiology. Interventional Radiology is loosely defined by its minimally invasive image-guided diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, giving Interventional Radiologists the ability to harness the power of advanced imaging (CT, MRI, Ultrasound, and other innovative modalities). These minimally invasive treatments can alleviate symptoms of vascular disease, stroke,  cancer, and other conditions.

matched.title: Ridgeway
matched.name: Borg & Ide Imaging | Ridgeway
matched.body:
Borg & Ide Imaging | Ridgeway has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at Borg & Ide Imaging's Ridgeway location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound, and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs.

This center is located off of Erie Canal Drive in the Unity Rehabilitation & Neurology at Ridgeway. At this location, we offer 3D mammography, biopsies, CT, DEXA Bone Density scans, 3T Wide-Open MRI, and ultrasound, among other services.

For over 90 years, Borg & Ide Imaging has provided radiological services to the Rochester region.

matched.title: Saredon Place
matched.name: Borg & Ide Imaging | Saredon Place
matched.body:
Borg and Ide Imaging | Saredon Place is our newest, leading-edge medical imaging center in Rochester, NY! Located at 1 Saredon Place in Suite 200, we will offer a variety of radiology exams including MRI, CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, DEXA (for bone density), Interventional Radiology, and walk-in X-Ray.

Borg and Ide Imaging | Saredon Place is located off Long Pond Road, less than half a mile south of Ridgeway Avenue. Conveniently located along the RTS bus route, this location is right across the street from South Pointe Landing and just a few blocks south of the Erie Canal.

We are excited to offer interventional radiology at Saredon Place. Interventional Radiology is defined by its minimally invasive image-guided diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, giving Interventional Radiologists the ability to harness the power of advanced imaging (CT, MRI, Ultrasound, and other innovative modalities). These minimally invasive treatments can alleviate symptoms of vascular disease, stroke, cancer, and other conditions.

For over 90 years, Borg and Ide Imaging has proudly offered radiology services across the Rochester region.

matched.title: Bethesda Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Bethesda Imaging Center
matched.address:
10215 Fernwood Rd.
Camalier Building, Ste. 620 & 20 (lower level)
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Bethesda Imaging Center is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery and Prince George’s counties. Our Bethesda Imaging center is a full-service location that provides a complete range of medical imaging exams and tests. Services include MRI/MRA, CT/CTA, 3D mammography, ultrasound, bone density measurement, calcium scoring, Vertebral Fracture Assessment (VFA), and X-Ray. 

Our Bethesda location has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at CRA Bethesda Imaging Center are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

Expectant mothers do not need to visit an ultrasound portrait studio for 3D images of their baby; they will receive free 3D images when they visit us for a physician-prescribed ultrasound exam. Moms can also rest assured that their ultrasound exam is being performed by experienced technologists and expert radiologists who are trained to recognize medically important conditions. Bethesda Imaging Center also offers a program called SnapIt that allows parents to share their ultrasound photos instantly online with family and friends through Twitter, Facebook, text, email, and more. 

Women who visit Bethesda Imaging Center for their mammogram can elect to have 3D mammography performed, which is the latest tool in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography can detect 40% additional invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust our women’s imaging experts to bring you the very best.

The Bethesda Imaging Center is located just 2 miles from Suburban Hospital in Bethesda, making it a convenient location to have your radiology exam performed. Our outpatient imaging center offers high-quality radiology services at less than half the cost that hospitals charge for radiology exams.

Community Radiology Associates | Bethesda Imaging Center is committed to providing state-of-the-art imaging services coupled with personalized service. Call us to find out more about the radiology services we offer and the convenient times we have available.

Click here for a printable location sheet.

matched.title: Bowie Radiology Services
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Bowie Radiology Services
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates (CRA) | Bowie Radiology Services is part of the CRA network of outpatient radiology centers in Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery and Prince George’s counties in Maryland.

Community Radiology Associates offers a complete array of diagnostic imaging exams including 1.5T MRI/MRA with a wide-open design to accommodate claustrophobic and larger sized patients, CT/CTA, ultrasound, mammography, ultrasound, fluoroscopy, DEXA for bone density measurement and digital X-Ray. Patients needing an immediate X-Ray are welcome to come in on a walk-in basis; no appointment is needed.

Bowie Radiology Services also offers the very latest technology in women’s imaging, including 3D/4D obstetric ultrasound and 3D mammography. 

If you are an expectant mother, there is need to visit an ultrasound portrait studio for 3D images of your baby; Bowie Radiology Services provides free 3D images when you visit us for a physician-prescribed ultrasound exam. You can rest assured that your ultrasound exam is being performed by experienced technologists and expert radiologists who are trained to recognize medically important conditions. We also offers a program called SnapIt that allows parents to share their ultrasound photos instantly online with family and friends through Twitter, Facebook, text, email and more. 

Bowie Radiology Services offers the latest advancement in breast cancer screening – 3D mammography. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. Give yourself the advantage over breast cancer; ask about adding 3D mammography to your annual mammogram. You can trust our women’s imaging experts to deliver the very best care.

Community Radiology Associates | Bowie Radiology Services serves the communities of Bowie, Mitchellville, Crofton, Woodmere, Lake Arbor, Largo, Kettering, Springdale, Glen Arden and more.

Bowie Radiology Services provides a full spectrum of state-of-the-art diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. Please call for more information about our radiology services and convenient operating hours.

matched.title: Clinton Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Clinton Imaging Center
matched.body:
Clinton Imaging Center is a proud member of Community Radiology Associates’ network of outpatient radiology centers located in Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery, and Prince George’s counties in Maryland.

Community Radiology Associates | Clinton Imaging Center provides a full spectrum of radiology services including MRI/MRA, CT/CTA, ultrasound, mammography, DEXA for bone density measurement, Vertebral Fracture Assessment (VFA), and X-Ray.

Clinton Imaging Center serves patients in the communities of Clinton, Camp Springs, Hillcrest Heights, Forestville, Rosaryville, Suitland, Temple Hills, and more. Our center is less than two miles from Andrews Airforce base making it a convenient option for military families in need of a radiology exam.

With the advanced knowledge of our expert radiologists, state-of-the-art medical imaging technology, and our compassionate staff, we are able to deliver the most exceptional health care service possible. You can count on Community Radiology Associates | Clinton Imaging Center to provide timely, transparent, and accurate information about all aspects of your radiology exam.

Convenient appointment times and walk-ins for X-rays are available. Please call us today to learn more about how our imaging exams can help diagnose health conditions and injuries to help get you feeling your best again.

matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Crestwood
matched.body:
Community Radiology Crestwood Imaging located on the 1st floor suite 100, behind the United Health Group and across Bank Court from the BB&T Bank building offering abundant parking and a covered entrance.

Crestwood is just one of three leading-edge full-service outpatient imaging centers in Frederick County. Community Radiology’s Frederick located just about 6 miles south on US15 at 67 Thomas Johnson Drive Suite 4 and Community Radiology’s Rose Hill location is just 4 miles North on US15 off Motter Ave. at 1562 Opossumtown Pike. This center offers 1.5T Wide-Open MRI, CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, X-Ray, DEXA (Bone Density), Low-Dose CT (LDCT) Lung Screening, and Calcium Scoring.

matched.title: Frederick Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Frederick Imaging Center
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Frederick Imaging Center is part of a network of outpatient imaging centers located throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery, and Prince George’s Counties in Maryland. Our Frederick Imaging center offers a complete range of imaging services including 1.5T Wide-Open MRI and 3T Wide-Open MRI. Both MRI units at this location have a wide-bore design to accommodate claustrophobic and larger-sized patients. Other services include CT/CTA, fluoroscopy, bone density measurement, Vertebral Fracture Assessment (VFA), and X-Ray.

Frederick Imaging centers offers also offers the latest technology in women’s imaging, including 3D/4D obstetric ultrasound and 3D mammography. 

Expectant mothers need not visit an ultrasound portrait studio for 3D images of their baby; they will receive free 3D images when they visit us for a physician-prescribed ultrasound exam. Parents can also rest assured that their ultrasound exam is being performed by an experienced technologist and read by one of our expert radiologists who are trained to recognize medically important conditions. Frederick Imaging Center also offers a program called SnapIt that allows parents to share their ultrasound photos instantly online with family and friends through Twitter, Facebook, text, email, and more. 

Women who visit Frederick Imaging Center for their mammograms can elect to have 3D mammography performed, which is the latest innovation in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust our women’s imaging experts to bring you the very best.

With the advanced knowledge of our expert radiologists, compassionate staff, and state-of-the-art medical imaging technology, we are able to offer you the most exceptional health care service possible. You can count on Frederick Imaging Center to provide timely, transparent, and accurate information about all aspects of your radiology exam. Community Radiology Associates | Frederick Imaging Center is conveniently located at 67 Thomas Johnson Drive, just 1.9 miles from Frederick Memorial Hospital. Our center is also less than a half-mile from Fort Detrick, making it a great location for military families who are referred for a medical imaging exam. 

Our radiology center welcomes walk-ins for X-ray studies and is open on weekends to accommodate the busy lifestyles of our patients.

matched.title: Greenbelt Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Greenbelt Imaging Center
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Greenbelt Imaging Center is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout Carroll, Frederik, Montgomery and Prince George’s counties in Maryland. 

Greenbelt Imaging Center offers CT/CTA, ultrasound, mammography, DEXA for bone density measurement, Biopsy, Vertebral Fracture Assessment (VFA), and X-Ray. We accept walk-ins for X-Ray studies; no appointment is needed.

If you are an expectant mother, there is no need to visit an ultrasound portrait studio for 3D images of your baby; Greenbelt Imaging Center provides free 3D images when you visit us for a physician-prescribed ultrasound exam. You can rest assured that your ultrasound exam is being performed by an experienced technologist and read by one of our expert radiologists who are trained to recognize medically important conditions. We also offers a sharing program called SnapIt that allows parents to instantly send their ultrasound photos to family and friends through Twitter, Facebook, text, email and more. 

Greenbelt Imaging Center offers the latest technology in breast cancer screening – 3D mammography. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. Give yourself the advantage over breast cancer - ask about adding 3D mammography to your annual mammogram. Our women’s imaging experts are dedicated to delivering the very best care.

Community Radiology Associates | The MRI Center at Greenbelt serves patients in the communities of Greenbelt, New Carrollton, Hyattsville, East Riverdale, College Park, Langley Park, Beltsville, Bowie, Aldelphi and more.

Find out what sets Community Radiology Associates | Greenbelt Imaging Center Services above other radiology centers – our commitment to superb patient care and the latest technology for the most accurate, precise imaging results. Call today to find out more about our services and the convenient hours we offer to accommodate the busy lifestyles of our patients.

matched.title: Heritage
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Heritage
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates (CRA) Heritage is located at 8926 Woodyard Road 
and is our second center in Southern Prince George's County.  It is located less than 
1 mile from our CRA Clinton center on Woodyard Road, just off Branch Avenue near 
Joint Base Andrews.  CRA Heritage Imaging Center’s entrance is nestled between 
SunTrust Bank and Advanced Auto Parts, directly across Woodyard Road from CVS. 
For your convenience, the Pineview Lane Bus stop (Stop ID: 37318) is located in 
front of SunTrust Bank offering service from both bus #30 and #36. For information 
on Bus Routes & Schedules in Prince George’s County go to: 
https://www.princegeorgescountymd.gov/1122/Routes-Schedules 


CRA Heritage offers 1.5T MRI, 1.2T High-Field Open MRI, PET/CT, Ultrasound, 3D Mammography and DEXA (for Bone density). For 
your convenience, this location has walk-in X-ray hours from 8am-5pm, Monday 
through Friday.


At CRA Heritage your comfort and well-being are our highest priority. These are the 
differences our patients notice and why they return again and again. Please call to 
find out more about our services and convenient hours, including extended 
weekday hours and weekends.

matched.title: Medical Park Drive
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Medical Park Drive
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Medical Park Drive is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery, and Prince George's counties. Our Medical Park Drive center is a full-service center that provides a full range of medical imaging exams and tests. Services include 1.5T Wide-Open MRI, CT, DEXA (for bone density), Ultrasound, 3D Mammography, Low-Dose CT (LDCT) Lung Screening, and Arthrography.

Women who visit Medical Park Drive for their mammogram can elect to have 3D mammography performed, which is the latest tool in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography can detect 40% additional invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust our women’s imaging experts to bring you the very best.

Our center is located at 2121 Medical Park Drive, Suite 1 in Silver Spring, MD with plenty of convenient parking. Positioned between 10301 Georgia Avenue and 2101 Medical Park Drive, we are located on the bottom floor across the hallway from Holy Cross Radiation Center. We are conveniently located 1.7 miles from Holy Cross Hospital, approximately 3.5 miles away from our White Oak and Lockwood centers, and approximately 6 miles away from our Leisure World center.

Community Radiology Associates | Medical Park Drive is dedicated to providing lead-edge imaging services, paired with personalized patient care. Call us today to find out more about our radiology services and our convenient scheduling and appointment availability.

matched.title: Montgomery Community MRI
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Montgomery Community MRI
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Montgomery Community MRI is part of a larger network of outpatient radiology centers in the Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery, and Prince George’s Counties in Maryland. Although Montgomery Community MRI exclusively offers MRI/MRA services, we have a full-service center conveniently located right down the street on Prince Philip Drive that offers open 1.5T Wide-Open MRI, CT/CTA, ultrasound, mammography, PET/CT, nuclear medicine, bone density measurement, fluoroscopy, and X-Ray. 

Our MRI center is located just 0.2 miles from Medstar Montgomery Medical Center making it a convenient option for MRI services ordered by your physician. Outpatient radiology services offered at our center are on average half the cost of imaging services performed at a hospital, making it an affordable alternative to hospital imaging without sacrificing quality.  

Community Radiology Associates | Montgomery Community MRI provides state-of-the-art diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. We are early adopters of digital imaging, reflecting our long-standing dedication to advanced technology. Please contact us to find out more about the radiology services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available to fit your busy schedule.

matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Mt. Airy Imaging Center
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Mt. Airy Imaging Center is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery, and Prince George’s counties in Maryland. 

Mt. Airy Imaging Center is conveniently located in the Mt. Airy Health & Wellness Pavilion in Carroll County. The center offers a full array of radiology services including open MRI/MRA, which is great option for claustrophobic and larger sized patients, CT/CTA, 3D mammography, ultrasound, bone density measurement, and X-Ray.

We offer the latest technology in breast cancer screening – 3D mammography. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust our women’s imaging experts to bring you the very best.

If you or your family is in need of an X-ray for an unexpected injury, just walk in to our center for immediate service. No appointment is required for X-ray studies. 
Community Radiology Associates | Mt. Airy Imaging Center serves the communities of Mt. Airy, Westminster, Columbia, Frederick, Damascus, Green Valley, Eldersburg and more. Our outpatient radiology center is located approximately 16 miles from Carroll Hospital, 17 miles from Howard County General Hospital and 14 miles from Frederick Memorial Hospital, making it a convenient location for patients in Frederick, Carroll, and Howard counties.

At Community Radiology Associates | Mt. Airy Imaging Center,  our dedicated specialty physicians, friendly compassionate staff and cutting edge technology allow us to offer our patients only the very best in diagnosis, management, follow up and care. Please call us to find out more about our imaging services and the convenient appointments we offer to patients.

matched.title: Olney Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Olney Imaging Center
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates (CRA) | Olney Imaging Center is part of CRA’s network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery and Prince George’s counties in Maryland.

Olney Imaging Center offers a complete range of imaging services including an open MRI/MRA unit to accommodate claustrophobic and larger sized patients. We have the “only true open MRI in Olney!” Other services include CT/CTA, mammography, PET/CT, nuclear medicine, fluoroscopy, bone density measurement, Vertebral Fracture Assessment (VFA), and X-Ray.

This location also offers the latest technology in obstetrics – 3D ultrasound. Expectant mothers need not visit an ultrasound portrait studio for 3D images of their baby; they will receive free 3D images when they visit us for a physician-prescribed ultrasound exam. Moms can also rest assured that their ultrasound exam is being performed by experienced technologists and expert radiologists who are trained to recognize medically important conditions. Olney Imaging Center also offers a program called SnapIt that allows parents to share their ultrasound photos instantly online with family and friends through Twitter, Facebook, text, email and more. 

Our full-service radiology center is located just 0.2 miles from Medstar Montgomery Medical Center making it convenient location for just about any imaging study your doctor orders. Outpatient radiology services offered at our center are on average half the cost of imaging services performed at a hospital, making it an affordable alternative to hospital imaging without sacrificing quality.  

Community Radiology Associates | Olney Imaging Center serves patients in the communities of Olney, Laytonsville, Brookeville, Burtonsville, Redland, Montgomery Village, Gaithersburg, and more.

With the advanced knowledge of our expert radiologists, compassionate staff, and state-of-the-art medical imaging technology, we are able to offer you the most exceptional health care service possible. You can count on Olney Imaging Center to provide timely, transparent and accurate information about all aspects of your radiology exam.

At Rockville Imaging at Seven Locks, we know your time is valuable and we treat it as such. matched.title: Rockville Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Rockville Imaging Center
matched.body:
For over 20 years, Rockville Imaging Center has proudly served as one of the leading providers of diagnostic imaging services in Montgomery County. Rockville Imaging center is a part of the Community Radiology Associates network of outpatient imaging centers located throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery and Prince George’s counties in Maryland.

Community Radiology Associates | Rockville Imaging Center is a full-service radiology center offering 3T wide-open MRI for superior image clarity and more room for claustrophobic patients, CT/CTA, mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and X-Ray.

We accept walk-ins for X-Ray studies to accommodate the busy lifestyles of our patients. So if you or your family needs an immediate X-Ray for an unexpected injury, no appointment is needed.

Shady Grove Adventist Hospital is located about a half a mile from Rockville Imaging Center to provide quick and convenient access for patients in need of a radiology exam. 

Community Radiology Associates | Rockville Imaging Center’s board-certified radiologists have sub-specialty training in a wide range of areas, including musculoskeletal imaging, women’s imaging, head and neck imaging, neuroradiology and more. Our radiologists’ advanced knowledge helps physicians throughout Montgomery County and the surrounding areas provide more accurate diagnoses and improve health outcomes for their patients. Call today to learn more about our services and the convenient appointment times we have available.

matched.title: Rose Hill
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Rose Hill
matched.body:
Community Radiology Rose Hill is one of three premier leading-edge outpatient imaging centers located in Frederick County. Our Rose Hill location is across the street from Exxon nestled in behind Dunkin Donuts on the first floor with covered drop-off and abundant parking. Community Radiology’s Frederick location is just a quick 5-minute drive away at 67 Thomas Johnson Drive, Suite 4. Community Radiology’s Crestwood is located just 12 minutes South on US15 to 270 S at 7211 Bank Court.

Rose Hill offers 3T Wide-Open MRI, CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, Nuclear Medicine, PET/CT, Fluoroscopy, X-Ray, Low-Dose CT (LDCT) Lung Screening, Prostate MRI, Calcium Scoring, and Arthrogram.

matched.title: The MRI Center at Greenbelt
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | The MRI Center at Greenbelt
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | The MRI Center at Greenbelt is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout Carroll, Frederik, Montgomery, and Prince George’s counties in Maryland. 

The MRI Center at Greenbelt exclusively offers state-of-the-art MRI services to patients. We have several MRI units to accommodate any type of MRI study you may need, including 1.5T wide-open MRI for claustrophobic and larger-sized patients and the most powerful MRI available - 3T Wide-Open MRI for superior image clarity. 

Community Radiology Associates | The MRI Center at Greenbelt serves patients in the communities of Greenbelt, Beltsville, Hyattsville, New Carrollton, East Riverdale, College Park, Langley Park, Bowie, Aldelphi, and more.

Our combination of dedicated, specialty-trained radiologists, skilled imaging technologists, friendly compassionate staff and cutting edge technology allow us to offer our patients only the very best in diagnosis, management, follow up and care. Call Community Radiology Associates | The MRI Center at Greenbelt today to find out about the quality MRI services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available.

matched.title: White Oak Imaging Center
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | White Oak Imaging Center
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | White Oak Imaging Center at corner is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery and Prince George’s counties in Maryland.  Our White Oak center is a full-service imaging center offering everything from MRI/MRA, CT/CTA, ultrasound, 3D mammography, DEXA for bone density measurement, fluoroscopy, Vertebral Fracture Assessment (VFA) and X-Ray. 

Community Radiology Associates | White Oak Imaging Center is proud to offer the latest tool in breast cancer screening – 3D mammography. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust our womens imaging experts at White Oak.

Our White Oak Imaging Center serves the communities of White Oak, Silver Spring, Kemp Mill, Hillendale, Bethesda, Forest Glen, Takoma Park, Chevy Chase, Garrett Park, Colesville, Fairland and more.

Conveniently located not far from New Hampshire Ave (MD 650), Stewart Lane and Columbia Pike (US-29), our White Oak location provides easy access to medical imaging services for the residents in and around Silver Spring. The center is located just 3.5 miles from Washington Adventist Hospital in Takoma Park, making it the perfect location to have all of your radiology exams performed, whether it’s an MRI or your annual mammogram. 

You can count on Community Radiology Associates | White Oak Imaging Center to provide timely, transparent, and accurate information about all aspects of your radiology exam. Call us today to find out more about the services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available.

matched.title: Women’s Imaging Germantown
matched.name: Community Radiology Associates | Women’s Imaging Germantown
matched.body:
Community Radiology Associates | Women's Imaging Germantown is part of a network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout Carroll, Frederick, Montgomery, and Prince George’s counties in Maryland. It is centrally located on the campus of Holy Cross Germantown Hospital.

Our Germantown Women’s Imaging Center is a full-service women’s radiology center offering digital and 3D mammography, 3D/4D Ultrasound (featuring SnapIt – our free image sharing program), ultrasound-guided biopsies, DEXA for bone density measurement and X-Ray. No matter what type of imaging study your physician has referred you for, you can count on us to provide quality care with the most timely and precise results.

Expectant mothers need not visit an ultrasound portrait studio for 3D images of their baby; they will receive free 3D images when they visit us for a physician-prescribed ultrasound exam. Moms can also rest assured that their ultrasound exam is being performed by experienced technologists and expert radiologists who are trained to recognize medically important conditions. The Women’s Imaging Center in Germantown also offers a program called SnapIt that allows parents to share their ultrasound photos instantly online with family and friends through Twitter, Facebook, text, email and more. 

Women who visit the Women’s Imaging Center in Germantown for their mammogram can elect to have 3D mammography performed, which is the latest tool in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for an annual mammogram, trust our women’s imaging experts to bring you the very best.

Visit Community Radiology Associates | Women’s Imaging Center, Germantown for all of your women’s imaging needs. We are dedicated to providing leading-edge imaging services coupled with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. Please call us to find out more about our women’s imaging services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Brandywine Imaging
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Brandywine Imaging
matched.body:
Delaware Imaging Network (DIN) | Brandywine Imaging, formerly a subsidiary of Papastavros Associates’ Medical Imaging, is located just off the Concord Pike heading south (Route 202) and across the street from Delaware Title Loans, Inc. This center serves Wilmington with a variety of services including Open MRI, 3D Mammography, CT, Fast Breast MRI, Ultrasound, and walk-in X-Ray.

Since 1958, DIN has been a leader in delivering high-quality diagnostic imaging, including a strong focus on Women’s Imaging. Led by our Women’s Imaging specialists, we go about and beyond to provide you with the best individualized breast care. No matter your imaging needs, DIN is dedicated to providing you with superior service, in a caring and comfortable environment.

matched.title: Brandywine Town Center
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Brandywine Town Center
matched.body:
Brandywine Town Center is open daily providing MRI services for patients in Northern Delaware and our patients traveling from Pennsylvania.

The Brandywine Town Center offers increased access and parking and has appointment times open daily. Call today to schedule at our Brandywine Town Center office.

matched.title: Dover
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Dover
matched.body:
Delaware Imaging Network | Dover, formerly Mid-Delaware Imaging, is located just off South Queen Street near South West Street. This center will serve the areas of Middletown, Smyrna, Milford, and Dover and will offer a variety of services including 1.5T MRI, Open MRI, CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, Arthrography, Fluoroscopy, DEXA (for bone density) and X-ray. 

Since 1958, Delaware Imaging Network has been a leader in delivering high-quality diagnostic imaging, including a strong focus on Women’s Imaging. Led by our Women’s Imaging specialists, we go above and beyond to provide you with the best-individualized breast care. No matter your imaging needs, Delaware Imaging Network is dedicated to providing you with superior service, in a caring and comfortable environment.

matched.title: Glasgow
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Glasgow
matched.body:
Delaware Imaging Network (DIN) | Glasgow is located right off of Glasgow Avenue and is a 15-minute drive south of Christiana Hospital. This location is a former subsidiary of Papastavros Associates’ Medical Imaging and provides Newark with radiology services like DEXA (for bone density), CT, MRI, Mammography, Fast Breast MRI, Ultrasound, and walk-in X-Ray.

DIN | Glasgow has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Glasgow location are fully accredited in Mammography, Stereotactic Breast Biopsy, Breast Ultrasound, Ultrasound-Guided Breast Biopsy, and Fast Breast MRI. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs. We go above and beyond to provide you with the best individualized breast care.

Since 1958, Delaware Imaging Network has provided the state with radiology services in a caring and comfortable environment. Currently, DIN has multiple centers across the state.

matched.title: Middletown
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Middletown
matched.body:
For over 60 years, Delaware Imaging Network has provided an array of radiology services across multiple centers throughout the state. Delaware Imaging Network (DIN) | Middletown, formerly a subsidiary of Papastavros Associates’ Medical Imaging, offers radiology services such as CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, DEXA (for bone density), Low-Dose CT (LDCT) Lung Screening, walk-in X-Ray, and the first 1.2T High-Field Open MRI in Middletown. With truly open architecture and robust clinical capabilities, our new open MRI provides exceptional patient comfort, while delivering superior imaging-quality – perfect for claustrophobic patients.

DIN | Middletown has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

We are located off Sandhill Drive (close to Middletown Warwick Road) and a 20-minute drive south from Christiana Hospital in Newark.

matched.title: Omega Imaging
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Omega Imaging
matched.body:
Delaware Imaging Network (DIN) | Omega Imaging is located in the Omega Professional Center at 6 Omega Drive. This center is easily accessible off of Ogletown Stanton Road and is behind The Blood Bank of Delaware. It is also a four-minute drive from I-95 and other major roads, making it a convenient spot for our patients.

This center provides 3T MRI, CT, Ultrasound, X-Ray, Fluoroscopy, Prostate MRI, Arthrography, MR Guided Breast Biopsy, Fast Breast MRI, Echocardiography, Stress Echocardiography, and Nuclear Stress Test. Delaware Imaging Network has provided Delaware with expansive radiology services across multiple centers for over 60 years.

Since 1958, DIN has been a leader in delivering high-quality diagnostic imaging, including a strong focus on Women’s Imaging. Led by our Women’s Imaging specialists, we go about and beyond to provide you with the best individualized breast care. No matter your imaging needs, DIN is dedicated to providing you with superior service, in a caring and comfortable environment.

matched.title: Pike Creek Imaging
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Pike Creek Imaging
matched.body: Located directly off Limestone Road, DIN’s Pike Creek Imaging center is a 20-minute drive west from Wilmington Hospital. This location offers CT, 3D mammography, DEXA Bone Density scan, 3D ultrasound and X-ray among other services. For over 60 years, Delaware Imaging Network has provided the state with radiology services. Currently, we have 8 centers with a variety of modalities to meet your needs.

matched.title: Polly Drummond
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Polly Drummond
matched.body:
Delaware Imaging Network (DIN) | Polly Drummond is situated directly across the street from The Goddard School and is a ten-minute drive from Christiana Hospital. At this center, we offer services including Arthrography, CT, DEXA (for bone density), 3D Mammography, Fast Breast MRI, Fluoroscopy, 1.5 T Wide-Open MRI, Ultrasound, and walk-in X-Ray.

DIN | Polly Drummond has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Polly Drummond location are fully accredited in Mammography, Stereotactic Breast Biopsy, Breast Ultrasound, Ultrasound-Guided Breast Biopsy, and Fast Breast MRI. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs. We go above and beyond to provide you with the best individualized breast care.

Since 1958, Delaware Imaging Network has provided the state with radiology services in a caring and comfortable environment. Currently, DIN has multiple centers across the state.

matched.title: Women’s Imaging Center
matched.name: Delaware Imaging Network | Women’s Imaging Center
matched.body:
Delaware Imaging Network | Women’s Imaging Center is located in the Omega Professional Center directly off Ogletown Stanton Road heading south and is a five-minute drive from Christiana Hospital. This center offers biopsies, DEXA Bone Density scans, 3D Mammography and Ultrasound.

DIN | Women's Imaging Center has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Women's Imaging Center are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

For over 60 years, the Delaware Imaging Network has provided the state with a variety of radiology services. Currently, DIN operates multiple locations statewide.

matched.title: Hudson Valley PET/CT Imaging
matched.name: Hudson Valley Radiology Associates | Hudson Valley PET/CT Imaging

matched.title: Mid Rockland Imaging
matched.name: Hudson Valley Radiology Associates | Mid Rockland Imaging
matched.body:
For over 40 years, Hudson Valley Radiology Associates (HVRA), a Lenox Hill Radiology affiliate, has provided Rockland and Westchester County with the most advanced and comprehensive imaging services. HVRA has set the region's gold standard of the highest level of patient care, compassion, and diagnostic accuracy. 

HVRA | Mid Rockland Imaging is located just a short drive from the I-87 Palisades Parkway interchange at 18 Squardron Boulevard, in New City. Our full-service imaging center offers a variety of services including MRI, Prostate MRI, CT, Nuclear Medicine, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, DEXA (bone density), Fluoroscopy, Lung Screening (LDCT), Arthrography, Virtual Colonoscopy, and walk-in X-Ray.

We are proud to continue the tradition of offering the highest level of care along with leading-edge technology with the introduction of advanced, non-invasive CT virtual colonoscopy. Virtual colonoscopy is a minimally invasive exam to screen for cancer of the large intestine. Patients may find virtual colonoscopy a fast and more tolerable colon cancer screening than a traditional endoscopic colonoscopy, which is commonly performed at an outpatient surgery center or hospital surgery suite.

At HVRA | Mid Rockland Imaging, you can save money without sacrificing quality. Our patient-friendly center offers high-quality imaging at a lower cost, especially compared to expensive hospital-owned imaging centers.

matched.title: ACPNY Jamaica Estates
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | ACPNY Jamaica Estates
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | ACPNY Jamaica Estates is located in Queens and is part of LHR’s network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout the New York metropolitan area. Our mission is to provide leading-edge imaging services paired with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. This facility offers 3D Mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density and X-ray services.

LHR | ACPNY Jamaica Estates is located within the Jamaica Estates section of Queens, at the intersection of Midland Pkwy and Hillside Ave. If you are traveling by train, take the E or F train to the 179 Street station, then walk East. If traveling by bus, take the Q36 to the Hillside Av/180 St stop or take the Q1, Q76, Q77, n22, n22x, n24, n26 bus to the Hillside Av/181 St stop.

matched.title: Annadale
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Annadale
matched.body:
Welcome to Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | Annadale, one of LHR’s diagnostic imaging centers on Staten Island. LHR | Annadale offers a variety of services including CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, DEXA (for bone density), LowDose CT (LDCT) Lung Screening, walk-in X-Ray, and 3T WideOpen MRI.

LHR | Annadale is our first imaging center on Staten Island to offer leading-edge 3T MRI technology. The high-resolution power of 3T MRI offers faster scans and more accurate results, offering reduced exam variations and the need for rescans. The wide-open bore provides enhanced patient comfort, and is perfect for claustrophic or larger-sized patients.

LHR | Annadale, conveniently located on Hyland Boulevard, is part of Lenox Hill Radiology's large network of medical imaging centers serving North Shore, South Shore, and MidIsland. If traveling by MTA, take bus S59 or S78.

matched.title: Bay Parkway
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Bay Parkway
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | Bay Parkway is our newest addition in Brooklyn and to LHR’s network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout the New York metropolitan area. Our mission is to provide leading-edge imaging services paired with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. Previously known as Pinnacle Diagnostic Radiology, LHR | Bay Parkway is a full-service medical imaging center. This facility offers a complete range of imaging services including MRI, CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, Digital X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement. We have the very latest in MRI technology with our 3T MRI magnet, which offers superior image quality for imaging difficult areas like the brain (neurological), small joints, large joints and muscle (musculoskeletal), and high-resolution prostate imaging.

Our entire network of imaging centers offers 3D Mammography, the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D Mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone.* So when it is time for your annual screening mammogram, you can trust the 3D Mammography experts at Lenox Hill Radiology.

LHR | Bay Parkway is located within the Bensonhurst/Mapleton section of Brooklyn, less than 2.5 miles from Maimonides Medical Center. The location is conveniently situated on Bay Parkway between 60th Street and 61st Street. If you are traveling by train, take the F train to Bay Parkway or the N, Q, or W trains to the 20th Avenue station. If traveling by bus, the B6 and B9 bus stops at the corner of Bay Parkway and 60th Street.

*https://pubs.rsna.org/doi/10.1148/radiol.12121373

matched.title: Bay Ridge
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Bay Ridge
matched.body:
Bay Ridge, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging Services center, is now an affiliate of Lenox Hill Radiology’s outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Bay Ridge, conveniently located on 91st Street, between 4th and 5th Avenues, in the heart of Bay Ridge, is a full-service imaging center offering CT, 3T Wide-Open MRI, arthrogram, digital mammography, fluoroscopy, ultrasound, thyroid fine needle aspiration, digital X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement. No matter what type of imaging study your physician has referred you for, you can count on Lenox Hill Radiology to provide quality care with the most timely and precise results. 

Visit Lenox Hill Radiology | Bay Ridge for all of your imaging needs. We are dedicated to providing state-of-the-art imaging services coupled with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. Please call us to find out more about our imaging services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Bay Shore
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Bay Shore
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology’s Bay Shore facility (formerly Medical Arts Radiology) provides Long Island’s South Shore with a wide array of medical services. Located just off Montauk Highway and on the corner of Oakland Avenue, our facility is a two-minute drive from Southside Hospital. Whether it’s a Biopsy, CT scan, or DEXA Bone Density scan, we are happy and ready to help. Other services we provide include 1.5T MRI, 3D Mammography, Fluoroscopy, Ultrasounds, and X-rays.

Our Bay Shore location has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at Lenox Hill Radiology | Bay Shore are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound, and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs.

Lenox Hill Radiology serves the Long Island communities of Bay Shore, Commack, East Setauket, Huntington, Massapequa, Patchogue, Plainview, Smithtown, and West Babylon as well as all the boroughs of New York.

matched.title: Bayside
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Bayside
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology's newest imaging center in Bayside, situated near the intersection of Northern Boulevard and 213th Street, is easily accessible from public transportation. This location offers a variety of services including 3T Wide-Open MRI, 3D Mammography, PET/CT, CT, Ultrasound, Dexa (for bone density), and walk-in X-Ray.

LHR | Bayside is dedicated to providing only the very best in diagnosis, management and follow-up care through the combination of our dedicated specialty radiologists, friendly compassionate staff and leading-edge technology. Please call to find out more about quality services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Bensonhurst
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Bensonhurst
matched.body:
Bensonhurst, a former Doshi Diagnostic Radiology center, is a part of the Lenox Hill Radiology network of 25 outpatient radiology centers located in the New York metropolitan area. Lenox Hill Radiology in Bensonhurst is a full-service imaging center offering CT, MRI/MRA, 1.5T MRI for claustrophobic patients, digital mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

The center is conveniently located in southwest Brooklyn near the corner of Bay Parkway and 79th Street. Our Bensonhurst location is only about 1.5 miles from the Fort Hamilton military base and 1.8 miles to Coney Island Hospital.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Bensonhurst is easy to get to by train or bus. By bus, take the B6 or B82 bus to Bay Parkway/78th Street. By train, take the N line to Kings Highway. 

At Lenox Hill Radiology, your comfort and well-being are our priority. These are differences our patients notice and why they return again and again. Please call to find out more about our services and convenient hours, including extended weekday hours and weekends.

matched.title: Bond Street
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Bond Street
matched.body:
Part of the Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) network of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area, Bond Street, a former Doshi Diagnostic Radiology center, is located on the corner of Bond and Fulton Streets by Cookies Department Store.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Bond Street can accommodate all of your imaging needs. This full-service radiology center offers CT, MRI/MRA, 3T MRI, 1.2T Open/High Field MRI for claustrophobic patients, digital mammography, nuclear medicine, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

The outpatient imaging center is located just 1/4 mile from Brooklyn Hospital Center and only a few short blocks from Long Island University, Brooklyn campus.

To get to Lenox Hill Radiology | Bond Street by bus, take the B, M, Q & R lines to DeKalb Avenue. If you are traveling by car, street parking is available.

Find out what sets Lenox Hill Radiology above other radiology centers – our commitment to superb patient care and the latest technology for the most accurate, precise imaging results. Call today to find out more about our services and the convenient hours we offer to accommodate the busy lifestyles of our patients.

matched.title: Brooklyn Avenue
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Brooklyn Avenue
matched.body:
Brooklyn Avenue, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging center, is proud to be a part of the Lenox Hill Radiology network of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area. The center features state-of-the-art imaging technology, offering CT, MRI/MRA, 1.5T MRI for claustrophobic patients, digital mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

Located at the corner of Brooklyn and Snyder Avenues, our Brooklyn Avenue office is just a few short blocks away and within walking distance from SUNY Downstate Medical Center and Kings County Hospital Center. As a full-service radiology center, Lenox Hill Radiology at Brooklyn Avenue and can accommodate just about any radiology exam your physician orders.

Our combination of dedicated, specialty-trained radiologists, skilled imaging technologists, friendly compassionate staff, and cutting-edge technology allow us to offer our patients only the very best in diagnosis, management, follow up and care. Call Lenox Hill Radiology at Brooklyn Avenue today to find out about the quality imaging services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available.

matched.title: Cobble Hill
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Cobble Hill
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | Cobble Hill is part of LHR’s network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout the New York metropolitan area. Our goal is to provide leading-edge imaging services paired with the most accurate diagnosis and personalized patient care.

The facility at LHR | Cobble Hill is a beautiful, spacious, and recently expanded full-service medical imaging center. We offer a complete range of imaging services including MRI, CT, 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, DEXA (for bone density measurement), and walk-in digital X-Ray.

We have the very latest in MRI technology, including two NEW Wide-Open 3T MRI units, which are perfect for claustrophobic and larger-sized patients. The 3T MRI capability offers superior image quality for imaging difficult areas like the brain (neurological), small joints, large joints and muscle (musculoskeletal), and high-resolution prostate imaging.

As in all of our locations, LHR | Cobble Hill offers 3D Mammography (3D Tomo), the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D Mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone.* So when it’s time for your annual screening mammogram, trust the 3D Mammography experts at Lenox Hill Radiology.

LHR | Cobble Hill is located within Downtown Brooklyn, less than 1 mile from The Brooklyn Hospital Center and less than 2 miles from New York-Presbyterian Brooklyn Methodist Hospital. The location is conveniently situated on Smith Street between Warren Street and Baltic Street. If you are traveling by train, take the F or G trains to the Bergen St. station, which is 1 block away. If traveling by bus, the B57 bus stops 1 block away at Smith St./Warren St., and the B65 (Smith St./Bergen St.) bus stops less than 3 blocks away.

*Reference

matched.title: Columbus Circle Imaging
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Columbus Circle Imaging
matched.address:
5 Columbus Circle (1790 Broadway)
Lower Level and 9th Floor
matched.body: Our Columbus Circle location is on the corner of Broadway and W. 58th St and a two-minute drive from the Columbia University Medical Center. This location offers a wide variety of services including mammography, arthrography, CT, DEXA Bone Density scans and open MRI, among other modalities.
