matched.title: East 66th Street
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | East 66th Street
matched.body:
One of 70+ high quality Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) imaging centers in the metro region, LHR East 66th Street (formerly Manhattan Diagnostic Radiology),  now serves as Lenox Hill Radiology’s Center for Oncologic & Molecular Imaging. This center provides metro New York’s most-comprehensive suite of diagnostic & oncology imaging services, as well as biopsy & interventional services rivalling or exceeding the technology & expertise of many top hospitals in the region.

Driving & Parking

LHR 66th Street is located on the upper east side of Manhattan at 400 East 66th Street at 1st Avenue, just one block from York Avenue and close to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, NewYork-Presbyterian, Hospital for Special Surgery (HSS) and Weill Cornell Medical Center.

Our center is near to the Ed Koch Queensboro Bridge to Queens and the FDR Drive and has many parking garages in close proximity

Public Transportation

LHR East 66th St is conveniently located near multiple subway and bus lines, including the 2nd Avenue subway Q train, the Lexington Avenue 6 train, as well as many bus lines including M66, M15 and M31.

Lenox Hill Radiology is committed to providing a full spectrum of state-of-the-art diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. You can count on Lenox Hill Radiology to provide exceptional service and timely and accurate imaging reports. Please contact us to scheduling your PET/CT, learn about our radiology exams, subspecialty imaging experience, and convenient appointment times.

Services include:

Imaging

  • 1.5T Wide-open bore MRI

  • 64-slice CT

  • Nuclear Medicine/SPECT

  • 64-slice PET/CT

  • 3D Mammography

  • Ultrasound

  • Digital X-Ray

  • Fluoroscopy

Musculoskeletal services

  • Musculoskeletal Ultrasound

  • Musculoskeletal Ultrasound-guided Therapeutic Injection

  • Joint Aspirations

  • MRI Arthrogram

  • CT Myelography

Biopsy services

  • Thyroid: Ultrasound-guided FNA

  • Thyroid: Ultrasound-guided FNA with ThyroSeq

  • Breast: Ultrasound-guided Core Biopsy

  • Breast: Stereotactic Biopsy

  • Prostate: MRI/US Transperoneal Fusion BiopsyMRI

Sedation services

  • MRI

matched.title: East 77th Street
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | East 77th Street
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | East 77th Street is part of LHR’s network of 25 outpatient radiology centers located throughout the New York metropolitan area. The East  77th Street imaging center, between Madison Avenue and Park Avenue, on the upper east side of Manhattan, is our main location.

Our goal is to provide state-of-the-art imaging services coupled with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. Lenox Hill Radiology at East 77th Street, a full-service medical imaging center, offers a complete range of imaging services including MRI/MRA, CT/CTA, calcium scoring, arthrogram, digital and 3D mammography, biopsy, fluoroscopy, ultrasound, digital X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement. We offer a wide variety of MRI options including Wide-Open 1.5 T Wide-Open MRI, and Wide-Open 3T MRI units for claustrophobic and larger-sized patients. Our new 1.5T and 3T MRI units offer superior image quality for imaging difficult areas like the brain (neurological), small joints, large joints and muscle  (musculoskeletal). Also at our East 77th Street location, Lenox Hill Radiology offers high resolution Prostate 3T Wide-Open MRI and MRI-guided Prostate Biopsy.

Our East 77th Street imaging centers offers 3D mammography (3D Tomo), the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography (3D Tomo) detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust the 3D mammography experts at Lenox Hill Radiology.

Lenox Hill Radiology is located 1-block from Lenox Hill Hospital between Park Avenue and Madison Avenue just .8 miles from New York Weill Cornell Medical Center, and only 1.5 miles from Roosevelt Hospital. Lenox Hill Radiology at East 77th Street can accommodate all of your imaging needs at one convenient location and offers the latest innovations in medical imaging. Please contact us to learn more about the radiology tests and exams we offer, as well as our convenient appointment times.

If you are traveling by train, take the 6 train to 77th Street. By bus from uptown, take the M1, M2, M3, M4 bus to Madison Avenue; from downtown, take the M101, M102, M103 bus to Fifth Avenue.

matched.title: Eastern Parkway
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Eastern Parkway
matched.body:
LHR | Eastern Parkway is one of our newest additions in Brooklyn and LHR’s network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout the New York metropolitan area. Our center is located in the Crown Heights area of Brooklyn, less than 1 mile away from Kingsbrook Jewish Medical Center and Kings County Hospital Center. We are conveniently located on Eastern Parkway, situated between Utica Avenue and Rochester Avenue. If you are traveling by train, you can reach us by taking the 3, 4, or 5 trains to the Utica Avenue station, which is right across the street. If traveling by bus, the B14 and B17 buses stop at the corner of Utica Avenue and Eastern Parkway.

As a full-service medical imaging center, it is our mission to provide leading-edge technology, fast and accurate results, and excellent patient comfort and care. We offer a range of services including 3T MRI, 3D Mammography, CT, DEXA (for bone density), Ultrasound, and walk-in X-Ray.

We offer the latest in MRI technology with 3T Wide-Open MRI to accommodate all-size patients and/or claustrophobic patients. 3T MRI capability provides superior imaging quality for evaluating areas of the brain (neurological), small joints, large joints and muscles (musculoskeletal), and hi-resolution prostate imaging.

LHR’s entire network of imaging centers offers 3D Mammography, the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D Mammography detects 40% more invasive breast cancers than traditional mammography alone.* So when it is time for you to schedule your annual screening mammogram, you can trust the advanced technology and expertise at Lenox Hill Radiology.

*Reference: Radiological Society of North America

matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Elmont
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) is pleased to welcome LHR | Elmont, one of our newest medical imaging centers, to the LHR family! LHR | Elmont is conveniently located on Hempstead Turnpike, just minutes from the Cross Island Parkway. This new center offers a spacious, private, and comfortable environment for your medical imaging needs including a variety of exams: 1.5T Wide-Open MRI, 3D Mammography, CT, Ultrasound, Dexa (Bone Density), and walk-in X-Ray. LHR | Elmont serves the Elmont, Floral Park, Stewart Park, Stewart Manor, Garden City South, and Valley Stream communities.

Lenox Hill Radiology provides leading-edge diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. We are early adopters of digital imaging, reflecting our long-standing dedication to advanced technology. Please contact us to find out more about the medical imaging services we offer throughout the LHR network and the convenient appointment times we have available to fit your busy schedule.

As a full-service imaging center, Lenox Hill Radiology | Flushing offers CT, MRI/MRA, 3T Wide-Open MRI for superior image quality, Open MRI for claustrophobic patients, biopsy, digital mammography for screening and diagnostic exams, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

Located in Queens near the intersection of 147th and Elm Avenue, our imaging center is within walking distance to Flushing Hospital Medical Center and about 1/2 mile from New York Hospital, Queens.

The Flushing office, now under Lenox Hill Radiology management, provides state-of-the-art imaging services coupled with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. Our combination of dedicated specialty physicians, friendly compassionate staff and cutting edge technology allow us to offer our patients only the very best in diagnosis, management, follow up and care. Lenox Hill Radiology provides state-of-the-art diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. We are early adopters of digital imaging, reflecting our long-standing dedication to advanced technology. Please contact us to find out more about the radiology services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available to fit your busy schedule.

matched.body:
Hewlett, a former Doshi Diagnostic Services center, is now a proud affiliate of Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR). Lenox Hill offers 25 outpatient radiology centers conveniently located in the New York metropolitan area. Our Hewlett imaging center is located in Long Island at the corner of Broadway and Trinity Place.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Hewlett provides a wide spectrum of imaging exams including CT, MRI/MRA, 1.5T MRI, digital mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

If you are traveling by car, Lenox Hill Radiology | Hewlett offers onsite parking.  For patients traveling by bus, use the Nassau Inter-County Express N1 line to HEWLETT(Grant Pk) Broadway/ Rockaway Ave.

Utilizing state-of-the-art radiology equipment and board-certified, specialty-trained radiologists, skilled imaging technologists, and compassionate staff, we are able to offer precise, accurate reporting and excellent patient care.

Convenient appointment times and walk-ins for X-rays are available. Please call us today to learn more about how our imaging exams can help diagnose health conditions and injuries to help get you feeling your best again.

Centrally located in Nassau County, LHR | Hicksville is conveniently located on Broadway, just steps away from Broadway Commons IKEA and Target. LHR | Hicksville is also located closely to two other LHR imaging center: Plainview and Bethpage.

matched.title: Huntington
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Huntington
matched.body:
Our Huntington location (formerly Medical Arts Radiology) is situated conveniently on Wall Street between Mill Lane and Creek Road and is a three-minute drive from Huntington Hospital. Services that we provide at this center include CT scans, Calcium Scoring, DEXA Bone Density scans and 3D Mammography. We also provide fluoroscopies, 3T MRI, Ultrasounds, X-rays and Nuclear Medicine options.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Huntington has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Huntington location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

Lenox Hill Radiology serves the Long Island communities of Bay Shore, Commack, East Setauket, Huntington, Massapequa, Patchogue, Plainview, Smithtown and West Babylon as well as all the boroughs of New York.

matched.title: Jackson Heights
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Jackson Heights
matched.body:
Jackson Heights, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging Services Center, is now part of the Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) network of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area.

As a full-service medical imaging center, Lenox Hill Radiology | Jackson Heights offers CT, MRI/MRI, 1.5T wide-open MRI for claustrophobic patients, digital mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and X-Ray.

Our Jackson Heights imaging center is located in Queens at the corner of 76th Street and 37th Avenue, less than a ½ mile from Elmhurst Hospital.

To get to Lenox Hill Radiology | Jackson Heights by bus, take the Q32 bus that runs between Penn Station in Manhattan and Roosevelt Avenue. If traveling by car, street parking is available.

matched.title: Kew Gardens
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Kew Gardens
matched.body:
We are proud to welcome Kew Gardens, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging location, to the Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) family of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Kew Gardens is your one-stop radiology center for all of your medical imaging needs. Whether you need an annual screening mammogram or an MRI for an injured knee or PET/CT scan that your oncologist ordered, we are here to accommodate you. We offer a full array of imaging exams including CT, MRI/MRA, 3T wide-open MRI for claustrophobic patients, digital mammography, nuclear medicine, PET/CT, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

Located in Queens between Union Turnpike and 80th Road, Kew Gardens is a full-service imaging center equipped with state-of-the-art imaging equipment for the best results and maximum patient comfort. Radiology exams offered at this location include CT, MRI/MRA, 1.5T wide-open MRI, digital mammography, nuclear medicine, PET/CT, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, and digital X-Ray.

Lenox Hill Radiology at Kew Gardens is easy to get to by bus. Just take the Q10 bus to Kew Gardens Road/80th Road. The bus stop is right across the street from the imaging center.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Kew Gardens is dedicated to providing only the very best in diagnosis, management, and follow-up care through the combination of our dedicated specialty physicians, friendly compassionate staff, and cutting-edge technology. Please call to find out more about quality services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Kew Gardens Nuclear
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Kew Gardens Nuclear
matched.body:
Kew Gardens Nuclear, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging Services Center, is one of the latest additions to the to the Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) family of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Kew Gardens Nuclear offers nuclear medicine and PET/CT scans for all of your oncologic imaging needs. The nuclear office is located right next to the main Kew Gardens location in Queens between Union Turnpike and 80th Road. Although this imaging center is exclusively dedicated to nuclear medicine PET/CT, patients are able to go right next door for an array of other imaging tests including CT, MRI, mammography, ultrasound and digital X-Ray.

Traveling by bus to Kew Gardens Nuclear is easy. Patients can take the Q10 bus to Kew Gardens Road/80th Road and then walk right across the street to the imaging center.

Dedicated to providing only the very best in diagnosis, management and follow-up care, Lenox Hill Radiology | Kew Gardens Nuclear provides state-of-the-art imaging services coupled with accurate diagnosis and efficient services. Please call to find out more about our radiology services and appointment times that fit your busy schedule

This location offers a variety of services including 3T Wide-Open MRI and 1.5T MRI, 3D Mammography, CT, Ultrasound, Dexa (for bone density), and walk-in X-Ray.

LHR | Laurelton is dedicated to providing only the very best in diagnosis, management and follow-up care through the combination of our dedicated specialty radiologists, friendly compassionate staff and leading-edge technology. Please call to find out more about quality services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Levittown
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Levittown
matched.body:
Welcome to LHR | Levittown, one of Lenox Hill Radiology's newest diagnostic imaging centers on Long Island. Formerly a Zwanger-Pesiri imaging center, this new LHR location offers a variety of services including 3T Wide-Open MRI, 1.5T Wide-Open MRI, CT, Ultrasound, 3D Mammography, DEXA (bone density), and walk-in X-Ray. Conveniently located on Hempstead Turnpike, between the Wantagh State Parkway and the Seaford-Oyster Bay Expressway, this center will serve the areas of East Meadow, North Bellmore, Bethpage, Hicksville, and Plainedge.

LHR | Levittown is part of Lenox Hill Radiology's large network of diagnostic imaging centers serving Long Island's communities of Bay Shore, Huntington, Massapequa, Patchogue, Plainview, West Islip, East Islip, and Hewlett as well as all the boroughs of New York.

matched.title: Madison Avenue Medical Imaging
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Madison Avenue Medical Imaging
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology | Madison Avenue Medical Imaging is one of Lenox Hill Radiology’s (LHR) convenient 25 outpatient imaging centers located in the metropolitan New York area. Our Madison Avenue location offers a complete range of imaging services including MRI (1.5T), CT, digital & 3D mammography, biopsy, ultrasound, fluoroscopy, calcium scoring, X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement.

Madison Avenue Medical Imaging offers 3D mammography, the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography detects 40% invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone. So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust our women’s imaging experts to bring you the very best.

With the advanced knowledge of our expert radiologists, compassionate staff, and state-of-the-art medical imaging technology, we are able to offer you the most exceptional health care service possible. You can count on Lenox Hill Radiology to provide timely, transparent, and accurate information about all aspects of your radiology exam.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Madison Avenue Medial Imaging is conveniently located in Midtown, on the east side of Manhattan, at 240 Madison Avenue, 2nd floor (between 37th and 38th street) in the Syndicate Trading Company building. Transportation to our Madison Avenue imaging center is easy. Take the B, N, R, or Q train to 34th Street or the 4, 5, or 6 train to 42nd Street Grand Central.

To learn more about the imaging services Lenox Hill offers, as well as our convenient hours, please call us today.

matched.title: Midwood
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Midwood
matched.body:
Midwood, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging center, is located at the corner of Avenue R and East 13th Street in Brooklyn, NY. This full-center imaging center offers CT, MRI/MRA, 1.5T MRI, digital mammography, ultrasound, X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement. Midwood recently became an affiliate of Lenox Hill Radiology’s 25 outpatient radiology centers located in the New York metropolitan area. 

Conveniently located just 0.8 miles from New York Community Hospital and just over a mile from Beth Israel Medical Center, Lenox Hill Radiology | Midwood is the perfect Brooklyn location to have all of your radiology exams performed. We offer state-of-the-art diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment.

You can count on Lenox Hill Radiology to provide timely, transparent, and accurate information about all aspects of your radiology exam. Call us today to find out more about the services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available.

matched.title: Mill Basin
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Mill Basin
matched.body:
Mill Basin, a former Doshi Diagnostic Radiology location, is now part of the Lenox Hill Radiology's (LHR) network of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area.

The Mill Basin imaging center is located near the intersection of Ralph Avenue and Avenue O in southeast Brooklyn and offers a complete array of diagnostic imaging exams including CT, MRI/MRA, 1.2T Open/High Field MRI, digital mammography, ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement and digital X-Ray.

Lenox Hill Radiology in Mill Basin is conveniently located about 1.5 miles from Beth Israel Medical Center and New York Community Hospital and right down the street from Care Pharmacy. Nearby landmarks include Kings Plaza Mall (less than ½ mile away) and the Brooklyn Public Library, Mill Basin, also located on Ralph Street.

Transportation to Lenox Hill Radiology | Mill Basin is easy by car on the Belt Parkway which runs along the western portion of the Mill Basin. Onsite parking is available. The nearest subway station is at the Brooklyn College Station on Flatbush Avenue, northwest of Bergen Beach via the 2 and 5 trains that run within Brooklyn.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Mill Basin provides a full spectrum of state-of-the-art diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. Please call for more information about our radiology services and convenient operating hours.

matched.title: Parkchester
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Parkchester
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) is pleased to welcome LHR | Parkchester, one of our newest medical imaging centers, to the LHR family! LHR | Parkchester is located at 1888 Westchester Avenue in its namesake central Bronx neighborhood across from the elevated 6 train at Parkchester Station and east of the Hugh Grant Circle. This new center offers a spacious, private, and comfortable environment for your medical imaging needs including a variety of exams: 3T Wide-Open MRI, CT, Ultrasound, Dexa (Bone Density), and walk-in X-Ray.

Lenox Hill Radiology provides leading-edge diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. We are early adopters of digital imaging, reflecting our long-standing dedication to advanced technology. Please contact us to find out more about the medical imaging services we offer throughout the LHR network and the convenient appointment times we have available to fit your busy schedule.

matched.title: Patchogue
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Patchogue
matched.body:
Just a three-minute drive east from the Brookhaven Memorial Hospital Medical Center, the Lenox Hill Radiology of Patchogue (formerly Medical Arts Radiology) is primed to serve Suffolk County, Long Island with a variety of radiology services. We specialize in MRI/CT/PET scans, DEXA Bone Density scans, 3D Mammography, Ultrasounds and X-rays.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Patchogue has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Patchogue location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

Lenox Hill Radiology serves the Long Island communities of Bay Shore, Commack, East Setauket, Huntington, Massapequa, Patchogue, Plainview, Smithtown and West Babylon as well as all the boroughs of New York.

matched.title: Pelham Bay
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Pelham Bay
matched.body:
Pelham Bay, a former Doshi Diagnostic Imaging Center, is now part of the Lenox Hill Radiology network of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area. Located in the Bronx, Lenox Hill Radiology | Pelham Bay delivers a full spectrum of medical imaging services including MRI (3T), MRA, CT, digital mammography, ultrasound,  digital X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Pelham Bay is located across the street from D.O.C.S. Primary and Specialist Care in the Bronx. Our imaging center is less than a mile away from Jack D. Weiler Hospital, Jacobi Medical Center, and Albert Einstein College of Medicine.

At Lenox Hill Radiology your comfort and well-being is our priority. We know your time is valuable and we treat it as such. Our staff is trained to explain procedures in the simplest of terms or in great detail depending on YOUR need. If you need extra time, extra time is available. Please call to learn more about our imaging services and the convenient appointment times we offer to patients.

At this location, we provide biopsies, CT/MRI/PET scans, DEXA Bone Density scans, 3D Mammograms and Calcium Scoring. We also have Fluoroscopies, Nuclear Medicine, Ultrasounds and X-rays.

Lenox Hill Radiology | Plainview has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Plainview location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

Lenox Hill Radiology serves the Long Island communities of Bay Shore, Commack, East Setauket, Huntington, Massapequa, Patchogue, Plainview, Smithtown and West Babylon as well as all the boroughs of New York.

matched.title: Richmond Hill
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Richmond Hill

matched.title: Ridgewood
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Ridgewood
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | Ridgewood is our newest addition in Queens to LHR’s network of outpatient radiology centers located throughout the New York metropolitan area.  Our goal is to provide state-of-the-art imaging services coupled with accurate diagnosis and efficient services.  A full-service medical imaging center, this facility offers a complete range of imaging services including MRI/MRA, CT/CTA, calcium scoring, arthrogram, digital and 3D mammography, ultrasound, digital X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement. We have the very latest in MRI technology with a Wide-Open 3.0 T MRI for claustrophobic and larger sized patients. The 3T MRI capability offers superior image quality for imaging difficult areas like the brain (neurological), small joints, large joints and muscle  (musculoskeletal), and high resolution Prostate imaging.
 
As in all of our locations, LHR Ridgewood offers 3D mammography (3D Tomo), the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D mammography (3D Tomo) detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone.* So when it’s time for your annual mammogram, trust the 3D mammography experts at Lenox Hill Radiology.
 
LHR Ridgewood is located less than ½ mile from Wyckoff Heights Medical Center, and is conveniently situated on the prominent corner of Myrtle Avenue and St. Nicholas Avenue.   If you are traveling by train, take the L or M trains to the Myrtle-Wyckoff Avenues station, which is 1 block away. If travelling by bus, the Q55 bus stops directly in front of our facility (Myrtle/St. Nicholas Ave.), and the B26 (Wyckoff/Palmetto St.) and Q58 (Putnam/Wyckoff Ave.) buses stop less than 2 blocks away.   

*DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.1148/radiol.12121373

matched.title: Rochdale
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Rochdale

matched.title: Rockland
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Rockland
matched.body:
Formerly RDI (Rockland Diagnostic Imaging), LHR | Rockland is Lenox Hill Radiology’s newest imaging center affiliate, and joins the most trusted and largest network of high-quality imaging centers in the metro New York region.

LHR | Rockland boasts a brand new women’s imaging suite with the latest in 3D Mammography (Tomosynthesis), a 1.5T wide-open MRI, as well as Ultrasound, Dexa (for bone density), and digital X-Ray. Most appointments are available same-day, pending patient insurance verification and authorization, when applicable.

As a fully integrated center, patients have access to the broad services of the trusted Lenox Hill Radiology family of imaging centers. LHR | Rockland can now offer a truly comprehensive list of advanced and routine imaging derives as well as biopsy and interventional procedures to accommodate all your medical imaging needs within Rockland County and the Hudson Valley.

We are conveniently located across from Palisades Center and next to the Kia dealership on NYS-303 and located 2 miles west of Nyack Hospital, immediately off Exit 12 of US I-87.

You will continue to recognize the same friendly and caring staff that you have grown to know and trust. We look forward to serving you as LHR | Rockland.

matched.title: Ronkonkoma
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Ronkonkoma

matched.title: Sunnyside
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Sunnyside
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology's (LHR) newest imaging center in Queens, situated near the intersection of Queens Boulevard and Greenpoint Ave, is easily accessible from the 7 train at 46th St - Bliss St, and also the B24, Q32 and Q60 bus lines. This location offers a variety of services including 3T MRI, CT, Ultrasound, Mammography, Ultrasound, Dexa (for bone density), Prostate MRI and walk-in X-Ray.

LHR | Sunnyside is dedicated to providing only the very best in diagnosis, management and follow-up care through the combination of our dedicated specialty radiologists, friendly compassionate staff and leading-edge technology. Please call to find out more about quality services and convenient appointment times.

matched.title: Union Square Diagnostic Imaging
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Union Square Diagnostic Imaging
matched.body:
Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | Union Square Diagnostic Imaging offers a variety of services including 3T MRI (Wide/Open), 1.5T MRI, Breast MRI, General Ultrasound, Breast Ultrasound, and 3D Mammography. Our center also provides Musculoskeletal Ultrasound services, as well as therapeutic injections 4 days a week. Our center does not offer X-Ray services. Our nearby center, Union Square West, located on 15th Street between 6th and 7th Avenues, offers X-Ray exams 8:00 am - 4:30 pm. No need to call, just walk right in!

LHR | Union Square Diagnostic Imaging has been upgraded with Manhattan's newest women's imaging suite which features leading-edge breast imaging and interventional procedural technology.

Breast Biopsy: If you have been prescribed MRI Guided Breast Biopsy, Ultrasound Fine Needle Aspiration, or Stereotactic Breast Biopsy, many of our imaging centers within the LHR network offer these services. Please call to schedule.

LHR | Union Square Diagnostic Imaging, located on the corner of East 13th Street and 4th Avenue, is directly across the street from Mount Sinai Downtown Phillips Ambulatory Center and close to multiple hospitals including Mount Sinai Beth-Israel, NYU Medical Center, Weill-Cornell NY Downtown Hospital, and Mount Sinai Downtown Cancer Center. Public transportation options at Union Square are very convenient for our patients traveling from Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens, which include the 4, 5, 6 N, R, Q, W, and L trains. LHR | Union Square Diagnostic Imaging is part of Lenox Hill Radiology's large network of diagnostic imaging centers serving the Manhattan, NY area.

matched.title: Union Square West
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Union Square West
matched.address:
147 West 15th St.
Ground Floor & Lower Level
matched.body: Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) | Union Square West offers a variety of services including 1.5T Wide-Open, CT, Ultrasound, Fluoroscopy, Low-Dose CT (LDCT) Lung Screening, 3D Mammography, and Biopsy. LHR | Union Square West is located directly off West 15th Street and is a 14-minute drive from Bellevue Hospital Center. Public transportation options at Union Square are very convenient for our patients traveling from Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens, which include the 4, 5, 6 N, R, Q, W, and L trains. LHR | Union Square West is part of Lenox Hill Radiology's large network of diagnostic imaging centers serving the Manhattan, NY area.

matched.title: Uniondale
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Uniondale
matched.body:
Welcome to LHR | Uniondale, one of Lenox Hill Radiology's newest diagnostic imaging centers on Long Island offering the latest in digital X-Ray technology.

Digital X-Rays offer an immediate diagnosis of certain conditions with the smallest amount of radiation. There is little reason to worry about the small amount of radiation you will be exposed to when you receive a digital X-Ray. They provide virtually zero discomfort to the patient, and often with little to no preparation. Digital imaging gives us many advantages in handling your exam, including faster communication of results to your doctor. Digital imaging also allows your medical team to collaborate, if necessary, and to immediately compare previous exams with current ones, so that your health is properly monitored.

Neighboring the Mitchel Athletic Complex, LHR | Uniondale will serve the communities of Hempstead, Uniondale, Westbury, and Garden City. LHR | Uniondale is part of Lenox Hill Radiology's large network of diagnostic imaging centers serving Long Island's communities of Bay Shore, Huntington, Massapequa, Patchogue, Plainview, West Islip, East Islip, and Hewlett as well as all the boroughs of New York.

matched.title: Valley Stream
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Valley Stream

matched.title: Washington Heights
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Washington Heights
matched.body:
Washington Heights, a former Doshi Radiology center, is part of the Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) network of 25 outpatient radiology centers in the New York metropolitan area. A full service imaging center located in Manhattan, Lenox Hill Radiology offers MRI and open MRI for claustrophobic patients, CT, biopsy, nuclear medicine, ultrasound, thyroid ultrasound for fine needle aspiration, digital X-Ray, and DEXA for bone density measurement.

Located near the corner of West 174th and Broadway, LHR in Washington Heights is just a few blocks away from New York Presbyterian Hospital and the Columbia University Medical Center (0.3 miles) and is easy to get to by train or bus.

At Lenox Hill Radiology our combination of dedicated specialty physicians, friendly compassionate staff and cutting edge technology allow us to offer our patients only the very best in diagnosis, management, follow up and care.

Please call us to find out more about the services we offer and the convenient appointment times we have available. Trust us to provide fast accurate imaging results and top-notch patient care.

matched.title: Washington Heights North
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Washington Heights North

matched.title: Westchester
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Westchester
matched.body:
One of 70+ high quality Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) imaging centers in the metro region, LHR | Westchester (formerly Hudson Valley Radiology Associates an affiliate of Lenox Hill Radiology), now serves as Lenox Hill Radiology’s central Westchester County imaging center.

Our spacious and private outpatient imaging center features Westchester County’s most advanced imaging equipment, including CT scan, 1.5T MRI, and next generation 3D Breast Tomosynthesis (3D Mammography) screening; as well as Ultrasound, DEXA (for bone density), and walk-in X-Ray.

At LHR | Westchester you can save money without sacrificing quality. Our patient-friendly center offers high-quality imaging at a lower cost, especially compared to expensive hospital-owned imaging centers. Click here to learn more about spending less on your radiology.

Driving & Parking
LHR | Westchester is one our most-spacious and comfortable outpatient imaging centers, providing the most-convenient, fast access to medical imaging in Scarsdale, Eastchester, Bronxville, White Plains, New Rochelle, Larchmont, Mamaroneck and Tuckahoe.
 
LHR | Westchester is located in central Westchester at 115 Main St., Tuckahoe, near NewYork-Presbyterian Lawrence Hospital, Westmed Medical Group, Mount Sinai Doctors and Columbia Doctors Eastchester.
 
Our outpatient medical imaging center has plenty of onsite street parking.

Public Transportation
LHR | Westchester is located near public transportation such as Metro North Tuckahoe station.
 
Lenox Hill Radiology is committed to providing a full spectrum of leading-edge diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. You can count on Lenox Hill Radiology to provide exceptional service and timely and accurate imaging reports. Please contact us to schedule your imaging exam, learn about us and our subspecialty imaging experience.

matched.title: Yonkers
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Yonkers
matched.body:
One of 70+ high quality Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) imaging centers in the metro region, LHR | Yonkers (formerly Hudson Valley Radiology Associates an affiliate of Lenox Hill Radiology), now serves as Lenox Hill Radiology’s Yonkers imaging center.

Our newly constructed (2020) outpatient imaging center provides Yonkers and Westchester County’s most-comprehensive suite of diagnostic imaging & screening imaging services; rivalling or exceeding the technology & expertise of many top hospitals in the region.

Our beautiful outpatient imaging center features the newest, most advanced imaging equipment in the Westchester area, including CT scan, wide-open 3T MRI, 3D Breast Tomosynthesis (3D Mammography), as well as Ultrasound, DEXA (for bone density), and walk-in X-Ray.

At LHR | Yonkers you can save money without sacrificing quality. Our patient-friendly center offers high-quality imaging at a lower cost, especially compared to expensive hospital-owned imaging centers. Click here to learn more about spending less on your radiology.

Breast Cancer Screening & Earliest Detection
As with all LHR imaging centers in metro New York, LHR | Yonkers is a RadNet imaging center that employs the newest, most comfortable low-dose 3D mammography, making Lenox Hill Radiology mammography services an industry leader in early detection of breast cancer.

Driving & Parking
LHR Yonkers is conveniently located in North Yonkers at 984 North Broadway, just one block from St. John’s Riverside Hospital and close proximity to Montefiore Medical Group, Westmed Medical Group, Mount Sinai Doctors Yonkers, Columbia Doctors and New York-Presbyterian Lawrence Hospital.

Our outpatient medical imaging center has free onsite parking.

Public Transportation
LHR Yonkers is located near public transportation such as Metro North Greystone station and therefore accessible to points north and south such as Hastings-on-Hudson, Dobbs Ferry, and Riverdale. 

Lenox Hill Radiology is committed to providing a full spectrum of leading-edge diagnostic imaging services in a caring and comfortable environment. You can count on Lenox Hill Radiology to provide exceptional service and timely and accurate imaging reports. Please contact us to schedule your imaging exam, learn about us and our subspecialty imaging experience.

matched.title: Zilkha Radiology East Islip
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Zilkha Radiology East Islip
matched.body:
Located just off the Montauk Highway, LHR’s Zilkha Radiology in East Islip is an 18-minute drive east from Long Island Community Hospital. This location offers 3D Mammography, CT scans, DEXA Bone Density scans, 3T Wide-Open MRI, and PET/CT among other services.

Zilkha Radiology has joined forces with Lenox Hill Radiology, the largest provider of outpatient imaging in the NY metro area. Together, Zilkha Radiology and LHR brings people, processes and technology together to deliver exceptional care and true value to our patients.

matched.title: Zilkha Radiology West Islip
matched.name: Lenox Hill Radiology | Zilkha Radiology West Islip
matched.body:
Located off the Robert Moses Causeway, LHR’s Zilkha Radiology in West Islip is on Montauk Highway and a 24-minute drive from Long Island Community Hospital. This location offers 3D mammography, arthrography, biopsies, CT scans, fluoroscopies and ultrasounds, among other modalities.

Zilkha Radiology has joined forces with Lenox Hill Radiology, the largest provider of outpatient imaging in the NY metro area. Together, Zilkha Radiology and LHR brings people, processes and technology together to deliver exceptional care and true value to our patients.

matched.title: Medical Imaging of Manhattan
matched.name: Medical Imaging of Manhattan | Medical Imaging of Manhattan
matched.body:
When you come for your visit with us, your exam will be performed by one of our technologists. You will then consult with one of our NYC radiologists who, after studying your images, will meet with you and will review your medical history, perform a pertinent physical exam, discuss the interpretation of your results, make recommendations for follow-up, and answer your questions.

After your visit here, your images will be reviewed by another radiologist within the group, and an official report will be transmitted to your referring physician.

matched.title: Murray Hill Radiology and Mammography
matched.name: Murray Hill Radiology and Mammography | Murray Hill Radiology and Mammography
matched.body:
We are extremely excited about our relocation to the Upper East Side! The new facility is two blocks from the 59th Street and Lexington Avenue Subway Station (4-5-6 and N-R-W), as well as multiple bus lines off of Lexington Avenue. If driving from the East Side, there are garages on 61st Street between Park Avenue and Madison Avenue, as well as between 3rd Avenue and Lexington Avenue. If driving from the West, there is a garage on 60th Street between Park Avenue and Lexington Avenue.

This facility offers a complete range of imaging services including 1.5T MRI, DEXA (for bone density), Ultrasound, Biopsy, and 3D Mammography. 3D Mammography is the latest technology in breast cancer screening. Studies show that 3D Mammography detects 40% more invasive cancers than traditional mammography alone.* So when it is time for your annual screening mammogram, you can trust the 3D Mammography experts at Murray Hill Radiology and Mammography.

Our leading-edge medical imaging center is staffed with experienced Board-Certified and sub-specialized radiologists and licensed technologists. Our reputable radiologists are often requested by name, including Barbara Baskin, M.D., Stacey Tashman, M.D., and Caryn Gamss M.D. To learn more about our radiologists' backgrounds and specialties, click here. At Murray Hill Radiology and Mammography, it is our mission to provide leading-edge imaging services paired with the most accurate diagnosis in a caring and comfortable environment.

*https://pubs.rsna.org/doi/10.1148/radiol.12121373

matched.title: NJIN of Belleville
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | Belleville
matched.body:
New Jersey Imaging | Belleville, formerly known as Progressive Imaging of Belleville, provides radiology exams to Essex County patients and their referring healthcare provider(s). NJIN of Belleville is a member of the New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN), which is a joint partnership between Barnabas Health and RadNet.

NJIN | Belleville has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Belleville location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound, and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs.

NJIN of Belleville is near the Clara Maass Medical Center, conveniently located at the corner of Newark Ave. and Clara Maass Dr. (entrance on Clara Maass Dr.). We help patients with a range of radiology services, including 3D mammography, 1.5T Wide-Bore MRI, PET/CT, CT, ultrasound, digital mammography, DEXA (bone density), and digital X-ray medical imaging studies. Please contact our center for hours or to learn more about our subspecialty experience.

We offer patients and their medical care team a range of radiology services, including 3T Wide-Bore MRI, 1.2T Open/High Field MRI, CT, ultrasound, fluoroscopy, lung screening, prostate MRI, and arthrogram medical imaging studies. We also offer X-Ray services by appointment only Tuesday through Friday. To learn more about our subspecialty experience or for our center’s hours, please do not hesitate to contact us.

New Jersey Imaging Center | Hackensack, formerly known as Diagnostic Radiology Associates of Hackensack (DRA of Hackensack), is an outpatient medical imaging center that offers radiology exams to patients in Bergen County. NJIN of Hackensack is one of the members of the New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN), a joint partnership between Barnabas Health and RadNet.

NJIN Hackensack has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Hackensack location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

NJIN | Hackensack is located on Prospect Avenue, between Passaic Street and Berry Street. We perform a range of radiology studies, including 1.5T Wide-Bore MRI, CT, digital mammography, ultrasound, DEXA (bone density), digital X-Ray, and arthrograms. We would like to encourage patients and referring medical professionals to contact us to learn more, including our hours and subspecialty experience.

matched.title: NJIN of Haddon Heights
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | Haddon Heights
matched.body:
New Jersey Imaging Network | Haddon Heights, formerly known as Heights Imaging Center, provides medical imaging services to South New Jersey patients and their medical team in Camden County. NJIN of Haddon Heights is a member of the New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN). NJIN is a joint partnership between Barnabas Health and RadNet.

NJIN | Haddon Heights has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at Haddon Heights location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

NJIN of Haddon Heights is conveniently located near the intersection of White Horse Pike and Green St. Our radiology center offers a range of medical imaging services, including 3T Wide-Bore MRI, CT, ultrasound, digital mammography, DEXA (bone density), fluoroscopy and digital X-ray radiology studies. Please contact our center to learn more about our radiology practice, hours or subspecialty experience.

matched.title: Jersey City
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | Jersey City
matched.body:
New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN) | Jersey City is one of our newest outpatient medical imaging centers offering a variety of services including 3T Wide-Bore MRI, CT, walk-in X-Ray,  3D Mammography, Ultrasound, and DEXA (for bone density). 

NJIN | Jersey City is situated near the intersection of Pavonia Avenue and Summit Avenue. The Journal Square PATH entrance is conveniently located across the street on Pavonia Avenue; travel to our center with ease just minutes from Hoboken, Grove, Newport, and New York City. 

This new center is part of New Jersey Imaging Network, which operates numerous locations throughout the New Jersey region. With convenient hours, including weekend availability, NJIN | Jersey City provides leading-edge technology in a comfortable and caring environment. We encourage patients and referring medical professionals to contact us for more information.

matched.title: Mahwah
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | Mahwah
matched.body:
Formerly Ramic Medical Imaging, New Jersey Imaging Network | Mahwah is located directly off the Franklin Turnpike at the intersection of Rutherford Road. It is a 10-minute drive from Good Samaritan Hospital. This center offers 1.2T High-Field Open MRI, X-Ray and Ultrasound services.

Established in 2012, New Jersey Imaging Network has multiple locations that offer a wide range of radiology services. Our imaging centers provide services in Bergen, Essex, Hudson, Middlesex, Morris, Passaic, Union, Camden and Ocean counties.

matched.body:

NJIN of Rutherford is a member of the New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN), a joint partnership between Barnabas Health and RadNet.

This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

NJIN of Rutherford is located on Orient Way between Spring Dell and East Passaic Avenue. We offer patients and their referring medical providers a range of medical imaging services, including ultrasound, MRI, CT, digital mammography, DEXA (bone density) and digital X-Ray radiology studies. Patients and referring medical professionals are encouraged to contact us to learn about our hours and subspecialty experience.

New Jersey Imaging Network | Toms River - West & Women’s Imaging, formerly known as Ocean Medical Imaging Women’s Center, helps Ocean County women with their women’s imaging needs. NJIN of Toms River – West & Women’s Imaging is a member of the New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN). NJIN is a joint partnership between Barnabas Health and RadNet.

NJIN | Toms River - Women's Imaging has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our Toms River West location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures and quality assurance programs.

NJIN of Toms River | West & Women’s Imaging is conveniently located on the intersection of Mule Rd. and 37. Our women’s imaging center offers breast ultrasound, digital mammography, and DEXA (bone density) radiology studies. Please contact our center to learn more about our hours, subspecialty experience or women’s imaging practice.

NJIN of Union is conveniently located on Chestnut St. between Lincoln Ave. and Washington Ave. Our radiology center offers a range of medical imaging services, including high-field open MRI, MRI, CT, ultrasound, nuclear medicine, fluoroscopy, digital X-ray and arthrogram radiology studies. Please contact our center to learn more about our radiology practice, hours or subspecialty experience.

matched.title: Washington Township
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | Washington Township
matched.body:
New Jersey Imaging Network | Washington Township, provides medical imaging services for patients throughout South Jersey. Our Washington Township center is part of New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN), which operates numerous locations throughout the New Jersey region.

Our Washington Township location is conveniently located just off of Route 42 on Fries Mill Road and is easily accessible from all directions. The center is approximately 1 mile from Thomas Jefferson University Hospital, located in Sewell New Jersey. Our radiologists are board-certified, experience and specialized in many areas of interest.

At NJIN of Washington Township, we offer 3D Mammography, CT, Ultrasound, DEXA for bone density measurement, X-Ray and the first 1.2T High-Field Open MRI in South Jersey. With truly open architecture and robust clinical capabilities, our new open MRI provides exceptional patient comfort, while delivering superior image quality- perfect for claustrophobic patients.

matched.title: West New York
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | West New York
matched.body:
NJIN | West New York is an outpatient medical imaging center that has offered radiology exams to patients in Hudson County for over 30 years. This center is part of New Jersey Imaging Network, which operates numerous locations throughout the New Jersey region.

This center is located in the heart of West New York near the corner of 60th and Hudson Avenue. Within walking distance to local doctor's offices, shopping, and eateries, we offer convenient parking and easy access to public transportation. Our imaging center offers 3D Mammography, Ultrasound, Dexa (for bone density), and walk-in X-Ray. Need to schedule an MRI or CT exam? NJIN | Union City, located just 2 miles away, offers these exams. 

With convenient hours, including weekend availability, NJIN | West New York provides leading-edge technology in a comfortable and caring environment. We encourage patients and referring medical professionals to contact us for more information.

matched.title: NJIN of West Orange
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | West Orange
matched.body:
New Jersey Imaging Network | West Orange, formerly known as Diagnostic Radiology Associates of Northfield (DRA of Northfield), provides radiology services to Essex County patients and their referring physician(s). NJIN of West Orange is a member of the New Jersey Imaging Network (NJIN). NJIN is a joint partnership between Barnabas Health and RadNet that seeks to improve access to radiology services throughout New Jersey.

NJIN | West Orange has been designated as a Breast Imaging Center of Excellence by the American College of Radiology (ACR). This status recognizes breast imaging centers that have earned accreditation in all of the College’s voluntary, breast-imaging accreditation programs and modules, in addition to the mandatory Mammography Accreditation Program.

The breast imaging services at our West Orange location are fully accredited in mammography, stereotactic breast biopsy, breast ultrasound, and ultrasound-guided breast biopsy. Peer-review evaluations, conducted in each breast imaging modality by board-certified physicians and medical physicists who are experts in the field, have determined that this facility has achieved high practice standards in image quality, personnel qualifications, facility equipment, quality control procedures, and quality assurance programs.

NJIN of West Orange is conveniently located on Northfield Ave. between Dogwood Rd. and Vizcaya Blvd. Our medical practice offers many medical imaging services, including 1.5T Wide-Bore MRI, CT, ultrasound, DEXA (bone density), digital mammography, fluoroscopy, digital X-ray and arthrogram radiology studies. Please contact us to learn more about our radiology practice, confirm our hours or learn about our subspecialty radiology experience.

matched.title: Woodbridge
matched.name: New Jersey Imaging Network | Woodbridge
matched.body:
Since 1987, MRI of Woodbridge/Doctors Radiology Center has been the local leader in outpatient medical imaging, recognized by the American College of Radiology as one of the first Diagnostic Imaging Centers of Excellence in the nation.

We are excited to announce that effective March 1, 2020, we will partner with New Jersey Imaging Network, the largest outpatient imaging provider in New Jersey.

Our radiologists and staff will continue to serve you as NJIN of Woodbridge and are committed to providing you the exceptional medical imaging you deserve.
